p: In terms of toxicity, no synergistic effect was observed between the oil components but an antagonist effect was observed between a Cinnamaldehyde, a major constituent of C. zelanicum and other components explaining their low value [ 90]. An antagonistic effect between cuminaldehyde (a major component) and another constituent will be suspected for Cuminum cyminum EO due to the fact that the cumin blend was less irritant than essential oil.
